===Proverb===
{{zh-proverb}}

# [[marry]] a [[woman]] for her [[morality]] ([[rather than]] [[beauty]])

====Usage notes====
Sometimes used in combination with {{zh-l|納妾納色}} (literally "take concubine, take appearance") as {{zh-l|娶妻娶德，納妾納色}} ("when taking a [principal] wife, take the one furnished with morality; when taking a minor wife, take the one blessed with beauty").
